response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This offer reflects our commitment to making high-quality products accessible to discerning individuals like yourself. Please let us know if you wish to proceed with this exclusive offer. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your life.", "product_price": 1100000}
